name: Neophytes
description:
"In this exhibition, Eden presents a project that deals with gender transitions and liminality from a personal, contemporary, and local perspective. Their portraits focus on individuals they documented with a large format camera. In Neophytes, they emphasize the importance of connection in a journey of untying the social bonds of gender and transitions. In addition, the series presents abstract images made in an analog process in the darkroom by placing the liquid of the testosterone hormone on photographic paper that was exposed to light during the development process."

(By Rona Yefman, curator)
